name: Minecraft Nightmare (AdventureBox)
description:
You are a scientist. After your last experiment you managed to make yourself shrink. To make matters worse the pumpkin seeds you also experimented on have turned into murderous killer pumpkins. Fight the pumpkins and other players in this action packed game!

Tips for best playing experience:

  • Use Google Chrome
  • Disable AdBlock if activated on your device
  • The game also plays on Android devices
